resources.string:
Sing and record your favorite lullaby – one you remember best. The Lullaby Box allows you to record and allocate it to the region you originate from. First you record the lullaby, then you can assign the audio recording to the place were you grew up. The recordings are anonymous. 

The collection appears on a map that provides 
an overview regarding the origins of the participants. The recordings can be listened to outside on the screen.
Recording now. Tap again to stop.
Where did you grow up? Tell us the place where you spent your very first years – your cradle. The app will give you suggestions once you typed in the first letters of the place.
Choose a location from the drop down menu to continue.
Lullaby got submitted. You can listen to it on the tablet outside. Thank you!
The app looks for the file \'cities.sql\' in the root directory of the devices sdcard. Press the accept button to update the database.
App is updating the location database...
Error updating database. cities.sql is missing or has a wrong format
